p: where fT I is the molar fraction of terpene I and T II represents another terpene in the mixture. LC 50 CM were calculated using the LC 50 of Table 1 for both terpenes in the mixture and their corresponding proportions in the mixture. LC 50 MM were calculated using the LC 50 (Table 1) for the major terpene and the LC 50PBO (Table 1) for the minority terpene with their respective proportions.
